name: Trouble in Truffleopolis
description:
Paging truffle one, a game about exploration and the love of truffles.

Trouble in Truffleopolis 

was created for the 16 Days RPG Maker RTP Game Jam. 

Some creative liberties were taken as told by the game credits.

**sweatdrop**

Controls:

Computer: Arrow keys or WASD to move
Enter to interact & act
Q & E to move camera

Mobile: Tap with finger to move
Tap with finger to interact & act
